Tumaini: A Deep learning object detection API integrated to an android app, case of study in banana disease detection (Espa√±ol)


Tumaini is an android app that is helping farmers around the world to detect diseases in banana crops; This app uses in the backend a Flask API rest to connect the android app with the trained deep learning (DL) object detection models (using TensorFlow). In this talk, I am explaining the full pipeline to build an android DL App. This app have been featured in well known blogs as NVIDIA blog(https://blogs.nvidia.com/blog/2019/09/24/ai
banana
farmers
crop
disease) and is based in the research paper (https://plantmethods.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s13007
019
0475
z)
